alert.note: Alert for Tippecanoe; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:30PM EDT until August 03 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Tippecanoe County in west central Indiana... Northern Warren County in west central Indiana... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 530 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Otterbein to 8 miles west of Williamsport, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Rainsville around 550 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Pine Village. This includes Interstate 65 near mile marker 184. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
